title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
While pasta cooks, fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
In a small bowl, whisk the eggs and grated cheese together.
Drain the pasta, reserving a little pasta water.
Toss the pasta with the pancetta, then remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture to create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-sear the chicken until cooked through and slightly charred.
In a separate pot, simmer tomato puree with ginger, garlic, and spices.
Add the chicken to the sauce and stir in the heavy cream.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with naan or rice.

title: Classic Cheeseburger
summary: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, and tomato on a toasted bun.
instructions: Season the beef patty with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry the patty to your desired level of doneness.
Place a cheese slice on the patty during the last minute of cooking to melt.
Toast the buns slightly.
Assemble the burger with the patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Creamy mashed avocado on toasted sourdough bread with chili flakes and a drizzle of olive oil.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
In a small bowl, mash the avocado with lemon juice and a pinch of salt.
Spread the avocado mixture generously over the toast.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes.
Drizzle with a little olive oil before serving.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad of cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Chop the tomatoes and cucumber into bite-sized chunks.
Thinly slice the red onion.
Combine vegetables and olives in a large bowl.
Top with a large block of feta cheese or crumbled feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with dried oregano.
